trans-unit.source: Manages serialization plug-ins created, using <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.ISerializerFactory" /> and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor" />, by manufacturers who have their own proprietary serialization formats.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider" /> class.
Only fully trusted callers can create a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Nur voll vertrauenswürdige Aufrufer erstellen können ein <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider>.

trans-unit.source: The following examples show use of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Die folgenden Beispiele veranschaulichen die Verwendung der <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider> Konstruktor.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor" /> that contains serialization information for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter" />.
The <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> to which the returned object writes.

Initializes an object derived from the abstract <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter" /> class for the specified <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> that will use the specified descriptor.
An object of a class derived from <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter" />.
Only fully trusted applications can call <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider.CreateSerializerWriter%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Nur voll vertrauenswürdige Anwendungen können Aufrufen <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider.CreateSerializerWriter%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows using <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider.CreateSerializerWriter%2A> to return a plug-in serialization writer for saving a file.
trans-unit.target: Das folgende Beispiel zeigt die Verwendung <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider.CreateSerializerWriter%2A> einen Serialisierungswriter-Plug-in-zum Speichern einer Datei zurückgegeben.

trans-unit.source: One of the parameters is null.
The <paramref name="serializerDescriptor" /> is specifying the wrong version.
-or-
It is not registered.
-or-
The assembly file cannot be found.
-or-
The assembly cannot be loaded.
Gets a collection of the installed plug-in serializers.
A <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor" /> objects already registered.
trans-unit.target: Ein <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> von der <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor" /> Objekte, die bereits registriert.

trans-unit.source: The following examples show using <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider.InstalledSerializers%2A> to enumerate the plug-in serializers when saving a file.
trans-unit.target: In den folgenden Beispielen werden die Verwendung <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider.InstalledSerializers%2A> zum Aufzählen von Plug-In-Serialisierungsprogrammen beim Speichern einer Datei.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor" /> for the plug-in.
<see langword="true" /> to overwrite an existing registration for the same plug-in; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Registers a serializer plug-in.
Only fully trusted callers can use this method.
trans-unit.target: Nur voll vertrauenswürdige Aufrufer können diese Methode verwenden.

trans-unit.source: The method will interpret an already registered plug-in as the same one if it is the same in all these properties: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.DisplayName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyVersion%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.WinFXVersion%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Die Methode einen bereits registrierten interpretiert plug-in als identisch, wenn es in alle Eigenschaften gleich ist: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.DisplayName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyVersion%2A>, und <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.WinFXVersion%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="serializerDescriptor" /> is null.
<paramref name="overwrite" /> is <see langword="false" /> and the plug-in is already registered.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor" /> for the plug-in.
Deletes a serializer plug-in from the registry.
Only fully trusted callers can use this method.
trans-unit.target: Nur voll vertrauenswürdige Aufrufer können diese Methode verwenden.

trans-unit.source: The method will interpret a registered plug-in as the same one passed to this method only if it is the same in all these properties: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.DisplayName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyVersion%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.WinFXVersion%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Die Methode einen registrierten interpretiert-Plug-in demselben eines an diese Methode übergeben nur, wenn es in alle Eigenschaften gleich ist: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.DisplayName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyVersion%2A>, und <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.WinFXVersion%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="serializerDescriptor" /> is null.
The plug-in is not registered.
See **Remarks**.
